song.title: Still
song.lyrics:
[1] .C G/B Am Hide me now . F D/F# G Under Your wings .C/E F Cover me . Dm7 G Within Your mighty hand
[c] .C F G C When the oceans rise and thunders roar .C F G Am I will soar with You, above the storm || . F G/B Csus4 C Father, You are King over the flood . F G Fmaj9 I will be still and know You are God
--- [2] . C G/B Am Find rest my soul . F D/F# G In Christ alone .C/E F Know His power . Dm7 G In quietness and trust
